attributes.action: Stop Penalising UK Home Owners in the Goverments fight against Inflation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why should home owners be penalised in the Goverments fight against inflation by having their mortgage rates increased?
Members of society who live in rented and all other means of accomodation are also responsible for inflation, not just home owners.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/mortgages/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
